Key Match Events: Bahrain drew first blood in the 15th minute courtesy of a stunning 35-yard freekick by Mohamed Marhoon
Ragnar Oratmangoen equalised for Indonesia in first-half stoppage time
Rafael Struick sent a sublime curling effort into the far corner to give Indonesia a 2-1 lead
Mohamed Marhoon scored a last-gasp equaliser for Bahrain in the 99th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesia were furious that the final whistle had not gone with only six minutes of added time originally signalled by the fourth official
An Indonesia official was shown his marching orders from the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indonesia have already proven they can match it with the continent's best in the third round of Asian qualifiers for the 2026 FIFA World Cup
Indonesia continued their unbeaten start to the third round of Asian qualifiers
